sys.h File Reference

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

The sys library servers the purpose of creating a common, system-indepenent interface layer for cross-platform applications. It currently supports UNIX and Windows, and provides interfaces for sockets, threads, synchronization, conditions, time and operating system-specific function calls.
